Original:
爆爆爆 😋😋特別的小地方！ 好吃、實在、無雷！每一道都有自己的 特色料理手法，很強的烹調，令人驚豔的巷內小店、想像如果門口外有海灘、那吃起他們的食物配上生啤酒，完美破表。 但還好裡面的音樂不錯 所以也是大大加分、吃美食都會搖。

二個老闆非很客氣，因為他們只有二人廚房，做事很紮實的店家🥳🥳、人多時需要時間等候餐點，所以建議提早點餐到達餐廳就馬上享用最佳美食時間。

💯推薦幾道菜，泡菜炒臭豆腐、烤豆皮、一夜干、鮭魚卵炒飯、好吃！啤酒超讚👍，如果有想挑戰的可以點蟹膏雞肉串，炒蛤蜊也很下酒。整體是重口味路線，內湖小酌聊天的好地方‼️
EN:
Special small places!It's delicious, real, thunderous!Each has its own special cuisine, very strong cooking, stunning small shops in the lane, imagine if there is a beach at the door, the food that eats them with raw beer is perfectly broken.Fortunately, the music inside is good, so it will be greatly added and eat food.

The two bosses are not very polite, because they only have two kitchens, and the shops with solid work 🥳🥳 and people need time to wait for meals for a long time.

泡 Recommend a few dishes, kimchi stinky stinky tofu, grilled bean skin, dried overnight, salmon egg fried rice, delicious!The beer is super happy. If you want to challenge, you can order crab paste chicken skewers, and fried clams are also very wine.Overall is a heavy taste route, a good place for Neihu drinking chat‼️ ️

Original:
餐點幾乎無雷！每一道都有自己的特色料理手法，不是很陽春的烹調，令人驚豔的寶藏巷內寶藏小店。

老闆很客氣，因為他們只有二人廚房，人多時需要時間等候餐點，老闆他們在訂位時就會告知，甚至建議到達餐廳的最佳時間。

推薦幾道菜，泡菜炒臭豆腐，無敵好吃！那個泡菜很夠味。炒青菜有沙茶香，也非常喜歡，炒蛤蜊也很下酒。整體是重口味路線，小酌聊天的好地方。

The meal is almost thunderous!Each has its own special cooking technique. It is not very good to cook, and the stunning treasure shop in the treasure lane.

The boss is very polite, because they only have two kitchens, and they need time to wait for meals for a long time. The boss will inform them when booking, and even recommend the best time to reach the restaurant.

Recommend a few dishes, kimchi fried stinky tofu, invincible delicious!That kimchi is delicious enough.There are sand tea fragrances for fried vegetables, and I also like it very much.Overall is a good place for a heavy taste, drinking chat.

Original:
週日晚上在家附近找餐廳熟客是一間類似飲酒的小餐館，因為家人用餐以前一直沒有選這裡，附近吃騙了只好選這家來試試，打電話訂位，剛好有位子每道菜都還蠻精緻的份量不多，但是味道不錯，當然因為是適合下酒菜，所以味道略鹹了一點，但整體而言都還算不錯的餐廳。

這邊不管是炒青菜，烤牛排、烤中卷、胡麻豆腐、烤松阪豬、烤杏鮑菇、炒蛤蠣味道都很到位，好吃👍

唯一的缺點是無刷卡或電子支付只能現金及轉帳，附近因為在巷弄你地方比較小不好停車
EN:
Finding a restaurant near home on Sunday evening is a small restaurant similar to drinking, because the family did not choose here before eating. I had to choose this one to try this. The exquisite portion is not much, but the taste is good. Of course, because it is suitable for drinking and vegetables, the taste is slightly salty, but the restaurant that is pretty good as a whole.

Whether it is fried vegetables, steak, grilled rolls, flax tofu, grilled pines, grilled Pleurotus eryngii, fried oysters in place, delicious 👍

The only disadvantage is that a brushless card or electronic payment can only be cash and transfer. It is not easy to stop because it is relatively small in the alley.

Original:
這個地方很棒——食物很好，價格也很合理，工作人員做得很好，讓你有賓至如歸的感覺。首先警告 - 如果是週末或假日，這個地方會擠滿人，他們將無法照顧您的餐桌。儘管如此，他們從來不介意有人偷看廚房並索取任何東西——他們對此感到滿意。食物真的很好而且每次我去的時候他們都會免費給我額外的食物。

我唯一的疑慮是工作人員沒有時間每分鐘觀察所有顧客，所以如果有壞/煩人的顧客，他們沒有時間解決這個問題。只要在一個慢節奏的夜晚去那裡，你就會有一個很棒的體驗。
EN:
This place is great -the food is very good and the price is reasonable. The staff does well, so that you have the feeling of seeking guests.First warning -if it is weekend or holiday, this place will be crowded, and they will not be able to take care of your dining table.Nevertheless, they never minded that someone peeked at the kitchen and asked for anything -they were satisfied with it.The food is really good and every time I go, they will give me extra food for free.

My only doubt is that the staff does not have time to observe all customers every minute, so if there are bad/annoying customers, they have no time to solve this problem.As long as you go there on a slow -paced night, you will have a great experience.

祝你好運！
